get.summary: Retrieve current account plan
Retrieve statistics about this customer for a timeframe

parameters.name: timeFrame
parameters.description: Timeframe of the request. See list at $timeframeList

parameters.name: fromDay
parameters.description: If using a "custom" timeFrame you can specify the starting day (YYYYMMDD)

parameters.name: toDay
parameters.description: If using a "custom" timeFrame you can specify the ending day (YYYYMMDD)

parameters.name: hourly
parameters.description: If using "yesterday" or "today" timeframe you can ask for the hourly detail

get.summary: Retrieve statistics about this customer for a timeframe grouped by some temporal entity (day/week/month)

parameters.name: timeFrame
parameters.description: Timeframe of the request. See list at $timeframeList

parameters.name: fromDay
parameters.description: If using a "custom" timeFrame you can specify the starting day (YYYYMMDD)

parameters.name: toDay
parameters.description: If using a "custom" timeFrame you can specify the ending day (YYYYMMDD)

parameters.name: groupBy
parameters.description: The temporal entity you want to group by ("week"/"month"). If unspecified is "day".
